website_summaries.verdict: These boots don't just feel good whizzing down the slopes; they look good, too.
pros: We love that these boots won't hurt your shins when stopping too quickly
Worn by both beginner and regular skiers
Customers note they don't take long to break in
cons: Boot interior may overstretch after frequent use

customer_reviews.title: easy boot for a returning skier
customer_reviews.text: Inexpensive, easy boot for a returning skier. I normally wear a 7.5 so i got this size- when I first tried them on I thought they were too small and almost returned them. Now, after skiing a few times in the they are actually a little too big! Good boot, comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: emily

customer_reviews.title: Read before buy non free return product
customer_reviews.text: Never buy non free return product again! I wear 6.5 for 10+ years. Run through 3 ski boots at 6.5. I received this one and they are too small. So I had to return. The return costs 30+ dollars!!! . Think again to buy a not free return boots. This happens a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Wei

customer_reviews.title: I love, love
customer_reviews.text: I love, love, love my boots! I used to get shin bang when I rented boots at different resorts. I skied 3 days and my feet/shins felt great at the end of the trip.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Keller

customer_reviews.title: Super comfortable. No break in time
customer_reviews.text: Super comfortable. No break in time. Took them on a ski trip and wore them he whole weekend without new boot discomfort. Fit is good I wear a solid woman’s size 10 and the 27.5 is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Gretchen Grimm

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Love these boots. I have been renting gear since I was a little kid, I finally decided to invest in a good boot. I have heard great things about Rossignol boots and looked to see which ones fit my budget and style of skiing. I received the package early, tried the boots and they fit perfectly. They are very comfortable and durable. I cannot wait to take them on the mountain. Great seller, and price. I highly recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Tamara

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable, be careful with return policy hidden fees
customer_reviews.text: The boots are very comfortable. However, be aware that seller charges $10 stockin fee if you return.... So the return in case boot don't fit right is not really free.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Affordable Boot
customer_reviews.text: Wife's a size 10, ordered the womens 27.5, fit wife perfect, she loves them. Shipping was fast, arrived early, very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fit well
customer_reviews.text: I normally wear size 6.5, this boots fit me well. Had two ski trips with my new ski boots, feel comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Meihua

customer_reviews.title: Great boot, had to reorder larger size though
customer_reviews.text: At first I bought these boots in a 26.5 because that's what all the websites with ski boot sizing were telling me to buy (my shoe size is 9) but after receiving them and trying them on, they were a little snug. Returning and repurchasing was super simple though, I had my 27.5 in exactly one week. I love how the top buckle is adjustable, super helpful! Great ski boot, awesome design. Overall, very happy with this purchase :)
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Lovely Shop
customer_reviews.text: The shop is so lovely! They assisted me in a quick and kind way. Highly recommend purchasing from this shop!
customer_reviews.author: Janet Daniels

product_meta.title: Rossignol Kelia 50 Ski Boots Womens
product_meta.description:
The Rossignol KELIA 50 is one of the lightest women's alpine boots on the market and delivers a comfortable, generous fit for novice skiers. Coming in at a soft 50 flex and featuring a generous 104mm "wide" fit, the Kelia retains a contoured forefoot, strong heel cup and asymmetrical toe box for incredible comfort and support right out of the box. Sensor Fit technology provides an open instep and more articulate ankle area for increased comfort, circulation and warmth. The new 3-buckle design features an extra-wide cuff buckle and XL power-strap for easy closure. Pick up these stylish, affordable ski boots today!



 *  Technology: Sensor
 *  Shell: Polyolefine
 *  Cuff: Short Cuff (Sizes 220>255)
 *  Liner: Women Comfort Fit
 *  Last: 104
 *  Flex: 50
